parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired token' }) }}

parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.user_id,
  c.title,
  c.created_at,
  c.updated_at,
  COUNT(m.id) as message_count,
  MAX(m.created_at) as last_message_at,
  (
    SELECT m2.content 
    FROM messages m2 
    WHERE m2.chat_id = c.id 
    ORDER BY m2.created_at DESC 
    LIMIT 1
  ) as last_message
FROM chats c
LEFT JOIN messages m ON m.chat_id = c.id
WHERE c.user_id = CAST('{{ $json.user_id }}' AS UUID)
  {{ $json.company_id ? "AND c.company_id = CAST('" + $json.company_id + "' AS UUID)" : "" }}
GROUP BY c.id, c.user_id, c.title, c.created_at, c.updated_at
ORDER BY COALESCE(MAX(m.created_at), c.updated_at) DESC
LIMIT 100;
